title: Stage Lv5-P1-S02
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I had been working out regularly, I would have lost weight.
If she had been studying continuously, she would have passed the exam.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: If I had been working out regularly, I would have lost weight.
If she had been studying continuously, she would have passed the exam.
If he had been working harder, he would have been promoted.

sentences.kr: 돈을 계속 저축했더라면 집을 샀을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had been saving money, we would have bought a house.
If I had been practicing English consistently, I would have become fluent.

sentences.kr: 건강에 더 신경 썼더라면 지금 아프지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If he had been taking better care of his health, he wouldn't be sick now.

sentences.kr: 투자를 계속했더라면 지금 부자가 되었을 텐데.
sentences.en: If they had been investing continuously, they would be rich now.

sentences.kr: 더 주의 깊게 운전했더라면 사고가 없었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If she had been driving more carefully, there would have been no accident.
